description: This file implements the core logic for a Wi-Fi data plane component, handling various Wi-Fi frame types such as EAPOL, authentication, association requests/responses, and associated timeouts. It manages a processing thread, queues, and callbacks for Wi-Fi frame processing in a network device or system.

methods.name: void * process_data_plane_function(void * data)
methods.description: Main processing loop for the Wi-Fi data plane, handling queued data and timeout-based processing.

methods.name: void assoc_rsp_frame_sent(unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,void * data,unsigned int len)
methods.description: Handles outgoing association response frames, queuing the data for processing.

methods.name: void assoc_req_frame_received(unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,void * data,unsigned int len)
methods.description: Handles received association request frames, queuing the data for processing.

methods.name: void auth_frame_sent(unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,void * data,unsigned int len)
methods.description: Handles outgoing authentication frames, queuing the data for processing.

methods.name: void auth_frame_received(unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,void * data,unsigned int len)
methods.description: Handles received authentication frames, queuing the data for processing.

methods.name: void eapol_frame_sent(unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,wifi_eapol_type_t type,void * data,unsigned int len)
methods.description: Handles outgoing EAPOL frames (currently commented out).

methods.name: void eapol_frame_received(unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,wifi_eapol_type_t type,void * data,unsigned int len)
methods.description: Handles received EAPOL frames, queuing the data for processing.

methods.name: void deinit_wifi_data_plane()
methods.description: De-initializes the Wi-Fi data plane, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: int init_wifi_data_plane()
methods.description: Initializes the Wi-Fi data plane, creating necessary resources and starting processing thread.

methods.name: bool data_plane_queue_check_event(wifi_data_plane_event_type_t type,void * ctx)
methods.description: Checks if an event of a specific type and context exists in the queue.

methods.name: void * data_plane_queue_remove_event(wifi_data_plane_event_type_t type,void * ctx)
methods.description: Removes and returns an event of a specific type and context from the queue.

methods.name: wifi_data_plane_queue_data_t * data_plane_queue_create_packet(void * ptr,wifi_data_plane_packet_type_t type,BOOL setSignalThread)
methods.description: Creates a queue packet for data frames with specified type and signaling behavior.

methods.name: wifi_data_plane_queue_data_t * data_plane_queue_create_event(void * ptr,wifi_data_plane_event_type_t type,BOOL setSignalThread)
methods.description: Creates a queue packet for events with specified type and signaling behavior.

methods.name: void data_plane_queue_push(wifi_data_plane_queue_data_t * data)
methods.description: Pushes a data packet into the data plane queue, signaling the processing thread if required.

ctags.name: assoc_req_frame_received
ctags.pattern: /^void assoc_req_frame_received(unsigned int ap_index, mac_address_t sta, void *data, unsigned int/
ctags.signature: (unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,void * data,unsigned int len)

ctags.name: assoc_rsp_frame_sent
ctags.pattern: /^void assoc_rsp_frame_sent(unsigned int ap_index, mac_address_t sta, void *data, unsigned int len/
ctags.signature: (unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,void * data,unsigned int len)

ctags.name: auth_frame_received
ctags.pattern: /^void auth_frame_received(unsigned int ap_index, mac_address_t sta, void *data, unsigned int len)$/
ctags.signature: (unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,void * data,unsigned int len)

ctags.name: auth_frame_sent
ctags.pattern: /^void auth_frame_sent(unsigned int ap_index, mac_address_t sta, void *data, unsigned int len)$/
ctags.signature: (unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,void * data,unsigned int len)

ctags.name: eapol_frame_received
ctags.pattern: /^void eapol_frame_received(unsigned int ap_index, mac_address_t sta, wifi_eapol_type_t type, void/
ctags.signature: (unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,wifi_eapol_type_t type,void * data,unsigned int len)

ctags.name: eapol_frame_sent
ctags.pattern: /^void eapol_frame_sent(unsigned int ap_index, mac_address_t sta, wifi_eapol_type_t type, void *da/
ctags.signature: (unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta,wifi_eapol_type_t type,void * data,unsigned int len)
